attributes.action: The Government must abide by the result of the referendum
attributes.additional_details:
Elected members of parliament have the audacity to dislike the leave result given by the peoples majority vote.
On June 21st 2016, 51.9 percent of the people voted to leave the EU
As our representatives it’s there task  to comply with the people’s instructions.
attributes.background: To ignore the  Brexit referendum results sets a precedent for all future referendums to be irrelevant.
